name: Boxing Superstar
description:
Can you become the world heavyweight champion?

The makers of Football Superstar proudly present our new game... Boxing Superstar.

Boxing Superstar focuses on character development and strategy rather than quick reflexes. You start as at 16 year old flyweight full of potential and battle until you retire... what happens in-between is up to you!

IMPROVE YOUR ABILITIES
Upgrade abilities that suit your fighting style. Perhaps you become a power puncher looking to knockout your opponent? Maybe you prefer to use your fitness to grind an opponent down over time? The choice is yours.

CONTROL YOUR DESTINY
As you build your career, various decisions and events will mould you as a person and boxer. Do you chase the money or focus on becoming the best boxer you can be? How do you handle fame and fortune? And then there's the media and fans to worry about!

INCREASE YOUR WEALTH
As you earn more money, why not buy some businesses to make more? After all, you can put that extra cash to good use!

LIVE THE LIFE
As you work your way up the rankings you'll make more and more cash. Why not buy lifestyle items such a supercar or perhaps even a Yacht? Your lifestyle will make you more appealing to big endorsement deals!

HELP IS AT HAND
One thing is for sure, you’ll need help.
• Hire managers to get you a bigger cut of the fight purse.
• Coaches will help improve your fighting skills.
• Doctors will help you recover and get you back into the ring as soon as possible.

ARE YOU THE BEST?
Battle against thousands of boxers and progress from the flyweight division all the way to heavyweight. Can you reach the top?

Prove it…
